channel.title: Elixir on Noetic Nought
channel.description: Recent content in Elixir on Noetic Nought

item.title: Recurse Center, 2014-08-18
item.description: I refactored the API-diff code, and am pretty happy with what I have right now, and need to add support for diffing Classes. I’m considering using Atstroid instead of Python’s ast module, since some of the work that I want to do, has already been done for me. With the white-boarding group, we worked on a set of simple exercises for strings and arrays. José Valim’s presentation on Elixir was interesting and got me reading up a stuff about concurrency, and related stuff. Thanks!
